clothing designed for sleeping in: A comprehensive range of sleepwear and lingerie can be found at this store. They produce underwear and sleepwear in undyed and unbleached 100% organic cotton.
More examplesFewer examplesHe wears this thermodynamic sleepwear that he has patented. She has worn a succession of brightly coloured slips that all bear a strong resemblance to sleepwear. The company manufactures a unique line of sleepwear intended to help combat the effects of night sweats.
